title: Progress of learner should also be considered before merging
body: Learners in target regions also have to help learners in source regions to apply the missing logs. But currently min index is computed only by the progresses of voters, it can lead to in-continuous logs and panic in the end.

comments_data.body: Oh, that is a problem. For good news, PD makes sure the merge regions have no learner peer, so the previous releases won't suffer from it.
